snippet: As the number of competitors climbed, the International Yoga Asana Championship in Los Angeles offered an opportunity for yogis to show that their discipline belongs in the Olympics.
abstract: International Yoga Asana Championship in Los Angeles offers an opportunity for yogis to show that their discipline belongs in the Olympics.
lead_paragraph: As the number of competitors climbed, the International Yoga Asana Championship in Los Angeles offered an opportunity for yogis to show that their discipline belongs in the Olympics.

headline.seo: World Competitors Stretch to Prove Yoga Is a Sport
headline.main: Yoga Is Not Just Posing as Sport at World Event
headline.print_headline: Yoga Is Not Just Posing As Sport at World Event
